name: mcp-vibekanban
description: MCP server for Vibe Kanban project management (STDIO + HTTP transports)
setup: mkdir -p .claude && cp "$JEAN_ROOT_PATH/.claude/settings.local.json" .claude/settings.local.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No settings.local.json to copy, skipping'
run: MCP_TRANSPORT=http MCP_PORT=$(p=2400; while lsof -i :$p >/dev/null 2>&1; do p=$((p+1)); done; echo $p) npm run dev
